title.narrative: IGAD 2019-2021 Gender Responsive Land Adminstration and Monitoring
IGAD 2019-2021 Gender Responsive Land Adminstration and Monitoring

description.narrative: Project Goal: Enhance transnational land governance through capacity development on innovations in land administration, strengthening gender equality and improving land monitoring in the IGAD Region. Project Objectives 1) Enhance further the capacity of IGAD and its Member States to effectively implement gender responsive land administration systems through the application innovative tools 2) Strengthen gender mainstreaming in land administration for the IGAD Member States 3) To facilitate land monitoring for improved land policy reform processes and implementation in the IGAD Region 4) Enhance IGAD’s capacity to oversee the implementation of the Regional land program

Insatsens mål är att säkra tillgång till mark och markrättigheter för alla markanvändare i IGAD- (Inter-Governmental Authority on Development) regionen genom genomförande av Afrikanska Unionens (AU) Deklaration för markfrågor (Land Issues and Challenges in Africa) som förväntas stärka socioekonomisk utveckling och öka fred och säkerhet. Insatsen förväntas öka IGAD´s och dess medlemsländers kapacitet att genomföra landadministrativa reformer genom att operationalisera lämpliga ramverk och instrument för förbättrad service, jämställdhet och övervakning av markrättigheter. Insatsens mål är: 1) Förbättrad kapacitet hos IGAD och dess medlemsstater att effektivt genomföra en jämställdhetsintegrerad markadministration genom användning av innovativa hjälpmedel och verktyg. 2) Stärka och integrera jämställdhetsperspektivet i landadministrationen i IGAD:s medlemsstater. 3) Att underlätta övervakningen av markrättigheter för att förbättra policy för landreform processer och genomförande av desamma i IGAD-regionen. 4) Förbättra IGAD:s kapacitet att följa genomförandet av regionala landprogram. Insatsen pågår under två år (oktober 2019-september 2021) till en total kostnad av 35,000,000 SEK av vilka 18,000,000 ska användas för insatsens genomförande år 1 (oktober 2019-september 2020) och resterande 17,000,000 SEK ska täcka genomförandet under år 2 (oktober 2020-september 2021)

tag.narrative: 2.3 - By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment.

2.3 - Till 2030 fördubbla jordbrukets produktivitet och inkomster för småskaliga livsmedelsproducenter, i synnerhet kvinnor, ursprungsfolk, familjejordbrukare, boskapsskötande nomader samt fiskare, inklusive genom säker och lika tillgång till mark, andra produktionsresurser och insatsvaror, kunskap, finansiella tjänster och marknader samt möjligheter till värdeskapande och sysselsättning utanför jordbruket.

5.a - Genomföra reformer för att ge kvinnor lika rätt till ekonomiska resurser, möjlighet att äga och kontrollera mark och andra former av egendom samt tillgång till finansiella tjänster, arv och naturresurser, i enlighet med nationell lagstiftning

5.a - Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws.

title.narrative: Signed Agreement IGAD Gender Resp Land Admin and Monitoring 2019-2021
Signed Decision IGAD Gender Resp Land Admin and Monitoring 2019-2021

description.narrative: Summary of achievements Result area 1: Enhanced Capacity Development of IGAD Region on gender responsive land administration The Project targeted to developing Eight Innovative Tools. In the first year of the project, five innovative tools have been developed. The tools that have been developed have all received requests for roll out by the IGAD member States towards starting and or improving their land reform processes: Gender Responsive National Land Policy (to be piloted in South Sudan) Gender Responsive Alternative Dispute Resolution Manual (to be piloted in Uganda) Training of Trainers Manual on Effective Land Administration mainstreamed by gender (to be piloted in Djibouti) Model Gender Strategy for mainstreaming gender in law and policy in IGAD region (to be rolled out in Kenya) A practice Manual for Mainstreaming Gender in the Implementation of Land Reforms (to be used for a training in Ethiopia) A Training of Trainers Manual on Mainstreaming Gender in Land Administration (training of trainers to be held in Ethiopia) Development and validation of Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) mainstreamed by gender for standardized land services provision: Due to the failure to get well qualified consultants for the assignment, the modus of implementing this assignment changed from consultants to Member States Teams documenting case studies from best practices. Countries that are making progress on these are Uganda, Ethiopia and Kenya. One community of practice established on Women and Land. IGAD member states participating in this CoP and virtual meetings are convened monthly. Result Area 2: Strengthened gender mainstreaming in land administration in the IGAD Region Most of the activities, e.g. production of a documentary and coffee table book to show the multiverse of women, are at the initial stage of recruitment of consultants Result area 3: Strengthened Capacity of the IGAD Region to implement land monitoring The IGAD Land Governance Unit held a Land Governance mainstreaming session for the Agriculture and Environment Division (EAD. The meeting stimulated interest in developing joint programmes. During this reporting period, 3 concept notes that integrate Land Governance under the Agriculture and Environment Division have been developed for possible funding. Result area 4: Strengthened IGAD Land Governance project coordination and Implementation Staff have been recruited and on duty
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
